Articles.Content: As beautiful as KSP2's soundscape can be at times, I'd like to have a go at messing around with certain (UI) aspects of the game's soundscape to make it a bit less sensory overloady without muting it entirely. Is there any doccumentation on how to change or edit sounds in the game yet?

I don't think there's any documentation for the API itself yet, and from what I've seen mods use BepinEx to load themselves in-game.

With that being said I suppose you could use BepinEx or Harmony library/loader to make a mod that plays music  at certain points. It would be messy, but it could work.

Don't think there's any documentation for sound modding itself, but SpaceWarp does have an API for the loading of Wwise soundbanks, for more info, it's best to join the KSP2 modding server and ask around
